value: title: R Weekly 2019-29 useR! Keynote, modelsummary

By using the autoplot() function from the "ggfortify" package I can check assumptions for linear models:
-Q-Q plot: normality
-Residuals vs Fitted: linear relationship
-Scale-Location: homogeneity of the variance
-Residuals vs Leverage/Cook's distance: influential cases#rstats pic.twitter.com/GksKYXYVfg

— Romain Lef√®vre üêæ (@lefevreromain_) July 14, 2019

like here, i create a list of "adjective_animal" names to support an anonymous selection process pic.twitter.com/wabRIJiZWh
